org.mortbay.http
Class HttpEncoding

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--org.mortbay.http.HttpEncoding
public class HttpEncoding
extends java.lang.Object

HTTP content and transfer encodings. This class or derivations of it, are used by the HttpServer to apply transer and content encodings to requests and responses. This implementation handles the identity, gzip and deflate encodings. The class can be specialized to handle more encodings and an instance registered with HttpServer.

Version:
1.0 Wed Mar 6 2002
Author:
Greg Wilkins (gregw)
See Also:
HttpServer
